name: Lava Dog
description:
Dash from platform to platform to kill the enemies. Don't fall in the lava!

Controls:

- WSAD: Move

- Left Mouse Click: Attack

- Right Mous Click: Dash

If you die, it's not a big deal, you respawn on the same platform.

A game by Vincenzo Angrisano and Leon Arndt for the HAW Game Jam6

Love your feedback as always!
